description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Papers literary, scientific, &c. ... Edited by Sidney Colvin ... and J. A. Ewing ... With a memoir by R. L. Stevenson" Author: JENKIN, Henry Charles Fleeming. Contributor: COLVIN, Sidney - Sir, Keeper of Prints and Drawings, British Museum Contributor: Ewing, J. A.
